xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/1002200-André Gregory and Wallace Shawn on My Dinner with Andre 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null In this hour-long piece, recorded in 2009, filmmaker Noah Baumbach talks with his friends the writer-actors André Gregory and Wallace Shawn about their experiences making MY DINNER WITH ANDRÉ. Baumbach speaks first with Gregory, and then with Shawn. André Gregory and Wallace Shawn on My Dinner with Andre
